create_for_user: Select the member for whom a clan will be created

invite.send: {user}, you are invited to a clan by {author}
invite.accept: {user} accepted an invitation to a clan
invite.reject: {user} declined an invitation to a clan

leave.send: Are you sure you want to leave your clan?

role.list: A list of roles for a clan {name}

transfer.alert:
ATTENTION! You are going to give a clan **{name}** to the user {user}!
This is an important decision, and it's essential to ensure that your choice aligns with the clan's long-term goals and the new owner's readiness for this responsibility.
Please keep in mind that this process cannot be undone.
Are you entirely sure about your choice?

channel.select_channels_description: Select channels for interaction to continue

user_rights.description:
Select the category of rights to which you want to assign new rights, and then the rights themselves that will be assigned.
For the category `{right}`, prohibitive rights will be assigned unlike the others.
user_rights.updated: New channel rights have been set for `{right}`

name.set: A new name has been set for the channels: `{name}`

modal.title: Set limit for members in the channel

members_limit.set: A new channel members limit has been set: `{limit}`

rights.description: Select the participants that you want to add as guests to your channels or remove them
rights.add: Guests have been added to channels
rights.remove: Guests have been removed from channels

kick_user.description: Select who needs to be kicked out of the room
kick_user.confirmed: You kicked members out of the channel

ad.description: You can create a new ad or choose an existing one for settings and modifications.
ad.created: A new advertisement has been created: `{ad}`

delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete the clan?
delete.select_description: Choose the clan you want to delete

error.not_exists: There are no clans on the server **{guild_name}**
error.you_exist: You are already a member of a clan
error.member_exist: {user} is already a member of a clan
error.you_not_exist: You are not a member of a clan
error.member_not_exist: {user} is not a member of a clan
error.cmd_for_rank: This command is not available for your rank
error.owner_leave: As the owner of a clan, you are not allowed to leave it
error.kick_same_rank: It is prohibited to kick a member who has the same or higher rank than you
error.change_same_rank: It is prohibited to alter the rank of a member who has the same or higher rank than you
error.rank_yourself: You are not allowed to change your rank
error.same_rank: You are not allowed to honor a rank that is higher than yours
error.transfer_yourself: You cannot give a clan to yourself
error.transfer_disabled: Clan transfer disabled on the server
error.invite_limit: The clan already has a maximum number of members
error.you_dont_have_role_to_create: You do not have the authorized role to create/delete a clan
error.dont_have_channels: You do not have clan channels
error.members_limit_more_or_less: Limit cannot be greater than 99 and not less than 0
error.you_not_in_clan_voice: You are not in the clan voice channel
error.no_one_in_voice: There is no one in your voice channel
error.appearance_disabled: All external modifications are disabled on the server
error.ad_cooldown: You have recently already sent an advertisement, try {time}
error.ad_disabled: Clan ad disabled on the server
error.interaction_not_for_you: You are not allowed to interact with this
